summary: DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED WHILE STOPPED AT A RED LIGHT, SMOKE WAS SEEN COMING FROM UNDERNEATH THE HOOD.  THE VEHICLE WAS PULLED OVER TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND THE HOOD WAS RAISED.  SMOKE AND FLAMES WERE SPOTTED COMING FROM THE PLUG ON THE ALTERNATOR.  THE BATTERY WAS DISCONNECTED AND THE PLUG REMOVED.  THE FIRE SMOTHERED AND THE VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN TO AN INDEPENDENT REPAIR SHOP.  THE VEHICLE IS CURRENTLY UNDER GOING INSPECTION AND REPAIR.

DT: THE CONSUMER STATED:ON 5-19-04 HIS 1990 LINCOLN TOWN CAR BURNED WHILE IT WAS PARKED. WITHIN A HALF OF AN HOUR THE CAR WAS ENGULFED IN FLAMES.  THERE WERE 3 DIFFERENT INVESTIGATIONS DONE;. AN ELECTRICAL AND AND ENGINEERING INVESTIGATION, AND ONE DONE BY THE TAMPA FIRE DEPARTMENT  AND FOUND NO EXACT FAULT. .   HE SAID THERE WERE A TOTAL OF  3 OTHER CARS TOTALED, AND 4 OTHERS DAMAGED DURING THE FIRE. THE HOOD MELTED AWAY. THE CAR HAD ONLY 76,000 MILES ON IT AND HAD BEEN WELL MAINTAINED. HE DID SUBMIT MAINTENANCE REPORTS TO THE INSURANCE COMPANY, AND WAS NOT LIABLE FOR THE FIRE.*AK

DT: CONSUMER HAD A 1990 LINCOLN TOWN CAR WHICH CAUGHT ON FIRE.  WHEN  CONSUMER CAME HOME HE PARKED THE VEHICLE IN THE GARAGE, WENT INSIDE AND ATE, THEN A NEIGHBOR  POUNDED AT DOOR TO LET HIM KNOW HIS HOUSE WAS ON FIRE.  THE POLICE, FIRE DEPARTMENT, FIRE MARSHAL AND INSURANCE ADJUSTERS CAME OUT AND COULDN'T FIND THE REASON THE VEHICLE CAUGHT ON FIRE.   VEHICLE BURNED WITH SUCH INTENSITY THAT  PIECES LEFT WERE CHARRED AND NOTHING REMAINED.  A FEW FIREMEN WERE TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL DUE TO THE FIRE.  *AK

CONSUMER REPORTED THAT ALL FOUR DOORS CANNOT BE OPENED FROM THE OUTSIDE OF VEHICLE. ONE OF THE VEHICLE WINDOWS HAD TO BE LEFT OPEN TO GAIN ENTRANCE INTO THE VEHICLE.  DEALER WAS NOTIFIED, AND INFORMED  CONSUMERTHAT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT COVERED UNDER A RECALL. *AK

CONSUMER PARKED THE VEHICLE IN THE GARAGE AND IT CAUGHT ON FIRE, AND IN MINUTES WAS ENGULFED IN FLAMES. CONSUMER CONTACTED THE FIRE DEPARTMENT. THE VEHICLE BURNED COMPLETELY. THE FIRE DEPARTMENT NOTED THAT THE FIRE STARTED UNDER THE HOOD. *AK......... CONSUME RCLAIMED FIRE APPEARED  TO BE DUE TO MECHANICAL FAILURE IN CAR , POSSIBLY BRAKES.  *AK

THIS CAR IS ABOUT A PIECE OF JUNK.  PAINT IS ALMOST GONE, 3 OF 4 POWER WINDOWS DONT WORK, WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR HAS QUIT TWICE, REAR SUSPENSION FAILED, RADIO NON-FUNCTIONAL, MESSAGE CENTER SAYS THAT IT IS -76 DEGREES AT MOST TIMES WITH 400 MILES UNTIL EMPTY (NOT TRUE). *AK

VEHICLE STALLS WITHOUT WARNING ON HOT DAYS WHILE DRIVING.AND WHEN DRIVEN ON HOT DAYS AND IS PARKED WILL NOT START AGAIN , UNLESS IT COOLS DOWN. REPLACED THE IGNITION MODULE , WHICH I WAS TOLD WAS UNDER INVESTIGATION IN CALIFORNIA. *AK
HEADLIGHT LENS IS PLASTIC CAUSING IT TO BE HARD FOR THE CONSUMER TO SEE. DEALER NOTIFIED.  *AK
ON MAY 9TH MY CAR ENGINE BURST IN TO FLAMES WHILE PARKED AND OFF.

ON FEBRUARY 1, 2003, KIMBERLY LOVE WAS DRIVING A 1990 LINCOLN TOWN CAR WITH FAYE LOVE(PASSENGER).  WHILE DRIVING EAST ON INTERSTATE 26 IN COLUMBIA, SC AT 60 MILES PER HOUR, THE HOOD FLEW UP, SHATTERING THE WINDSHIELD.  THE HOOD WAS BENT AND THE FRONT WINDOW SHATTERED.  THE LATCH IS BROKEN ALSO. THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER WERE SHAKEN BUT ABLE TO PULL TO SAFETY.   *JB

CONSUMER STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN APPROXIMATELY 1/2 HOUR, AND THEN PARKED. 1 AND 1/2 HOURS LATER THE VEHICLE CAUGHT ON FIRE.  THE FIRE WAS IN ENGINE COMPARTMENT AND BURNED COMPLETE DRIVERS SIDE OF THE ENGINE. THE VEHICLE IS TOTALED, POSSIBLY ENGINE RELATED.  *YH

WHILE DRIVING 60 MPH HOOD FLEW UP WHICH IMMEDIATELY DISFIGURED/ DENTED, AND  STRUCK THE ROOF.  ONCE THE HOOD BENT BACK, IT STRUCK THE WINDSHIELD, SHATTERING IT.  OWNER HAD TO PULL OVER, AND TIE  HOOD DOWN BEFORE DRIVING VEHICLE TO DEALERSHIP RIGHT AFTER THAT.  PLEASE DESCRIBE DETAILS.  *AK
WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH HOOD SUDDENLY FLEW OPEN. MECHANIC INDICATED  LATCH PLATE WAS CORRODED.*AK
INTRUMENTAL PANEL IS NOT VISIBLE WHEN DRIVING IN  DAYTIME. UNABLE TO CHECK SPEED/ GAS,ETC.*AK
INSTRUMENTAL PANEL IS NOT LEGIBLE IN THE DAY TIME. UNABLE TO SEE HOW FAST VEHICLE IS GOING, AND HOW FULL GAS TANK IS. *AK  *YH

VEHICLE WAS GOING 40-45MPH IN THE DARK AND RAIN, AND VEHICLE WAS INVOLVED IN A FRONTAL COLLISION.  UPON IMPACT, AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY.   VEHICLE WAS TOTALED. CONSUMER SUSTAINED SPINAL INJURIES. DEALER WAS NOTIFIED.*AK  PHOTOS ATTACHED. *TT
LIGHT ON THE DASHBOARD DOESN'T APPEAR AT DAY, BUT AT NIGHT THERE IS LIGHT.  DASHBOARD IS DIGITAL.  THIS HAS BEEN A PROBLEM SINCE PURCHASE DATE OF THE VEHICLE. *AK

STEERING GEAR BOX FELL OFF WHILE DRIVING,CAUSING VEHICLE TO GO OFF ROAD. DEALER HAS YET TO BE CONTACTED. *AK  THE DEALER STATED THAT BOLTS SECURING STEERING BOX PULLED THROUGH RUSTY FRAME CAUSING STEERING FAILURE.  *YH
THE IGNITION SWITCH NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  EVERYTIME YOU WOULD TURN THE CAR OFF IT WAS VERY HAD TO RESTART.

WHILE DRIVING 35 MPH CONSUMER SAW SMOKE AND FLAMES COMING FROM UNDER THE HOOD. SHE PULLED OVER, AND FIRE DEPARTMENT PUT OUT FIRE. FIRE DEPARTMENT STATED THAT FIRE WAS CAUSED BY WIRING OR THE AIR CONDITIONING UNIT . VEHICLE WAS TOTALLED.*AK  *SLC
DASHLIGHTS  WERE NOT BRIGHT ENOUGH TO SEE  SPEEDOMETER.  VEHICLE HAS BEEN AT DEALER NUMEROUS TIMES OVER THE YEARS.  DEALER ADMITTED THERE  WAS A PROBLEM, COULD NOT REMEDY IT. *AK

HOOD LATCH ASSEMBLY - ON CHRISTMAS DAY HOOD FLEW UP INTO THE WINDSHIELD CAUSING THE WINDSHIELD TO GET SMASHED, THE HOOD WAS COMPLETELY BENT IN HALF, AND DAMAGED WAS DONE TO THE ROOF.  MY FAMILY AND I WERE TERRIFIED AND I WAS VERY HAPPY THAT MY HUSBAND WAS DRIVING.  IF HE DIDN'T DRIVE I AM SURE THIS WOULD HAVE BEEN A FATAL CAR ACCIDENT.  AS THIS HAPPENED, CAR SWERVED INTO LANE TO LEFT AND WE WERE SIDE-SWIPED BY A VAN.  THE VAN DID NOT STOP, NO ONE STOPPED.  WE WERE THERE FOR QUITE AWHILE BUT NO POLICE CAME.  WE JUST WANTED TO GET HOME.  OTHER OBVIOUS DAMAGE WAS THE DRIVERS FRONT END.  TOOK TO SALVAGE YARD BECAUSE WE WERE NOT AWARE OF THE SAFETY RECALL  AND THAT IT WAS NOT DONE ON THIS CAR.  THIS CAR HAD NO COLLISION ON IT BECAUSE IT WAS "OLDER"  DID FINALLY REPORT TO INSURANCE JUST TO HAVE ON RECORD.  IF WE KNEW ABOUT THE RECALL ON THIS I WOULDN'T HAVE BEEN DRIVING MY 2 & 4 YEAR OLD SONS IN THIS "SAFE" CAR.  I WOULD HAVE DONE DIRECTLY TO DEALER IF I KNEW ABOUT RECALL.  HAVE TRIED GOING THROUGH DEALER RECENTLY AND CALLING LINCOLN'S 800# TO SPEAK WITH THEIR CONSUMER AFFAIRS DEPARTMENT.  NO ONE IS CLAIMING ANY KIND OF RESPONSIBILITY AND YET IN MY MIND WE WERE ALMOST KILLED.  I NEVER RECEIVED A LETTER ABOUT THE RECALL.  ONLY THE PREVIOUS OWNERS APPARANTLY RECEIVED ONE.  I'M SURE LINCOLN WOULD PAY ATTENTION IF SOMEONE WAS KILLED DUE TO A SAFETY RECALL.  HOW CAN I GET LINCOLN TO MAKE MY CAR SAFE AND REIMBURSE ME FOR MONEY I DID PAY OUT DUE TO THIS OCCURRENCE -- THEY WON'T EVEN LOOK AT THE PART OF THE CAR THAT WAS RECALLED BECAUSE I HAD GONE TO A SALVAGE YARD TO HAVE HOOD REPLACED, WINDSHIELD REPLACED AND FRONT END DRIVERS HEADLIGHT REPLACED.  *AK

SHIFT LEVER DOES NOT SHIFT TO PARK. GEAR SHIFT WAS SLOPPY AND WOULD WOULD UP AND DOWN. STEERING COLUMN WAS TAKEN APART AND THE HOUSING TUBE THAT HOLDS THE STEERING LEVER INSIDE COLUMN HAD BROKEN IN HALF. THE PROBLEM HAS BEEN CORRECTED.
SHIFT ROD HOUSING BROKE IN HALF,INSIDE OF STEERING COLUMN. *AK

ON APRIL 23, 2001 OUR LINCOLN TOWN CAR HAD BEEN PARKED FRO ABOUT TEN MINUTES IN AN ENCLOSED PARKING STRUCTURE AT SUPERMARKET WHEN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT SELF-IGNITED. A MAJOR FIRE ENSUED BUT A PASSERBY HAD CALLED THE FIRE DEPARTMENT AND THE DAMAGE WAS LIMITED TO THE TOTAL LOSS OF OUR CAR. I HAVE EMAILED LINCOLN HQ REPEATEDLY SINCE THEN TO ASK IF THEY HAD ANY RECORD OF THIS UNUSUAL AND POTENTIALLY LETHAL PROBLEM. EACH TIME THEY REPLIED SAYING THAT THEY COULD NOT ANSWER TECHNICAL QUESTIONS. THEY REFERRED ME TO THE LOCAL DEALER, WHOSE SERVICE MANAGER I HAD ALREADY SPOKEN TO, AND WHO HAD NEVER HEARD OF THE PROBLEM.  I BELIEVE THAT THERE MAY BE MORE TO THIS?*AK

WHILE SITTING AT A STOP LIGHT THE SPARE TIRE T125/80R16, DOT FNTA2XHX150 LOCATED IN  TRUNK OF  1990, LINCOLN, TOWN CAR EXPLODED.  THIS EXPLOSION OF  SPARE TIRE RESULTED IN TRUNK OF VEHICLE, RAISING 1 1/2 INCHES ABOVE  NORMAL LEVEL AND A CHUNK OF GLASS AND  REAR VIEW MIRROR, TO FALL FROM  FRONT WINDSHIELD.  *AK   CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY A MICHELIN REPRESENTATIVE THAT AGE AND TEMPERATURE WOULD CAUSE A SPARE TIRE TO FAIL, THAT THEY NEEDED TO BE REPLACED PERIODICALLY, ONE PERSON WAS INJURED DUE TO FAILURE.   *SLC
NO SUMMARY LISTED FOR ABOV EVEHICLE.  *AK
VEHICLE STALLS INTERMITTENTLY. *AK
AFTER PARKING VEHICLE FOR 20 MINUTES IN DRIVEWAY CONUSMER NOTICED A POPPING NOISE. VEHICLE WAS ON FIRE IN THE ENGINE DEPARTMENT. FIRE DEPARTMENT PUT FIRE OUT. PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.*AK
WINDSHIELD WIPERS CUT ON AND OFF ERRATICLY DURING RAIN STORMS. LINCOLN CUTOMER SERVICE HAS BEEN CONTACTED.  *AK  *JB
WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE BEGAN TO SMOKE, POSSIBLE ENGINE FAILURE CAUSED THE ENTIRE VEHICLE TO CATCH ON FIRE.  NLM
WHILE DRIVING TRSANSMISSION MALFUNCTIONED DUE TO FAULTY BUSHINGS WITHIN  TRANSMISSION ASSEMBLY.  *AK  THE TRANSMISSION WAS DETERMINED TO HAD BEEN DAMAGED DUE TO FAILURE OF PLASTIC BUSHING.  *YH
NO SUMMARY LISTED FOR ABOVE VEHICLE.  *AK

VEHICLE STALLS WITHOUT WARNING ON HOT DAYS WHILE DRIVING IN CRUISE CONTROL AS WELL AS IN THE CITY IN STOP AND GO TRAFFIC, CONSUMER BELIEVES PROBLEM IS LINKED TO FAULTY TFI MODULE WHICH WAS UNDER INVESTIGATION IN CALIFORNIA.  NLM
WHILE DRIVING AT SPEED UNDER 30MPH CAR WILL SHUT OFF WHETHER  IN DRIVE/ PARK/ SWITCHING GEARS,  OR IDLING.  CONSUMER WAS IN AN ACCIDENT BECAUSE OF THIS PROBLEM.*AK

WHILE TRAVELLING S/B ON I89 IN VT ON 10/13/2000 AT APPROXIMATELY 70 MPH AT APPROXIMATELY 70 MILES INTO MY TRIP, THE HOOD FLEW OPEN AND TOTALLY COVERED THE WINDSHIELD, CAUSING THE WINDSHIELD TO SMASH AND THE ROOF TO BE DAMAGED.

STALLING ON INTERSTATE AND CITY DRIVING WHEN TEMP GETS VERY HOT, LOOSING THE POWER IN BRAKES AND THE ABILITY TO CONTROL THE VEHICLE'S STEERING. THE CAR CAN BE STARTED AGAIN WHEN IT HAS COOLED DOWN. THIS PROBLEM IS VERY DANGEROUS.

STALLING ON INTERSTATE AND CITY DRIVING WHEN TEMP GETS VERY HOT, LOSING THE POWER IN BRAKES AND THE ABILITY TO CONTROL THE VEHICLE'S STEERING. THE CAR CAN BE STARTED AGAIN WHEN IT HAS COOLED DOWN. THIS PROBLEM IS VERY DANGEROUS.*AK

STALLING ON INTERSTATE AND CITY DRIVING WHEN TEMPERATURE GETS VERY HOT.  LOSING THE POWER IN BRAKES AND THE ABILITY TO CONTROL THE VEHICLE'S STEERING.  THE CAR CAN BE STARTED AGAIN WHEN IT HAS COOLED DOWN.  THIS PROBLEM IS VERY DANGEROUS.    *AK    *NLM      **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*734325
MY FRAME IS RUSTED OUT  WHERE THE GEER BOX BOLTS UP TO THE FRAME AND THE OTHER SIDE IS THE  SAME WAY.  *AK( DOT NUMBER:   )
NO SUMMARY LISTED FOR ABOVE VEHICLE.  *AK

THE PAINT SHOULD NOT BE PEELING, I KNOW THIS IS NOT A SAFETY BUT FORD NEEDS TO KNOW.MY LEVEL RIDE IS A SAFETY PROBLEM.I WILL BE DRIVING AT 65 AND ALL OF A SUDDEN THE REAR WILL START BOUNCING AROUND.I HAVE TO SLOW DOWN THAN THE REAR LOWERS ITSELF AFTER AWHILE IT WILL GO BACK ON. PLEASE HELP BEFORE SOMETHING GOES ON.  *AK

THE CONSUMER HAS HAD MANY COMPONENTS REPLACED (HEADLIGHT SWITCH AND 2 DIGITAL DASH ASSEMBLIES) WHILE TRYING THE FIND THE CAUSE OF THE POOR VISIBILITY OF THE DASHBOARD BUT THE DASH HAS SHOWN NO NOTICEABLE CHANGE.  NLM
PULLED INTO GARAGE. SAW FIRE UNDER HOOD. CALLED FIRE DEPT. CAR BURNED. TOTAL LOSS PER INSURANCE ADJUSTER.*AK
CONSUMER HAD DRIVEN ABOUT 25 MILES, MADE A STOP AND REACHED  DOWN TO TURN OFF IGNITION,  AND SWITCH WAS OVERHEATED,  ABOUT 140 DEGREES.  THEN CONSUMER HAD TROUBLE ENGAGING THE STARTER.  *AK
INSTRUMENT PANEL IS NOT READABLE IN SUNLIGHT.  YH
VEHICLE CAUGHT ON FIRE. CONSUMER JUST SAW SMOKE COMING FROM UNDER THE HOOD.  VEHICLE TOTALLED.  DEALER CONTACTED, BUT PROVIDED NO ASSISTANCE.  *AK *ML

RECALL 98V322000/ FRONT CONTROL ARM: BALL JOINT. VEHICLE EXPERIENCING A CRACKED  FRONT CONTROL ARM:  BALL JOINT.  MANUFACTURER  NOTIFIED,AND INFORMED CONSUMER  THAT VEHICLE  WAS NOT COVERED UNDER MANUFACTURER'S  RECALL DUE TO VIN.  *AK
THE DIGITAL DASH ASSEMBLY HAS BEEN REPLACED TWO TIMES DUE TO DIFFICULTY IN READING IN THE DAYTIME.  *MJS
VEHICLE IN GARAGE FOR 10-15 MINUTES.  CAR ENGINE COMPARTMENT CAUGHT FIRE AND BURNT CAR AND HOUSE (TOTAL LOSS).  AAA INSURANCE TO INVESTIGATE.  *AK
VEHICLE HAD JUST BEEN PARKED IN GARAGE AND IT CAUGHT ON FIRE, TOTALLY DESTROYING THE  HOUSE AND CAR. FIRE IS BEING INVESTIGATED BY AAA.  *AK *ML
15 MINUTES AFTER FUELING VEHICLE AND PARKING IT IN GARAGE A FIRE STARTED, BURNING VEHICLE AND HOUSE. VEHICLE WAS  TOTALED,CAUSE UNKNOWN.  *AK

ONGOING / INTERMITTENT PROBLEM WITH VEHICLE TRAVELING ON THE HIGHWAY FOR 2 - 21/2 HRS. IT CAUSES  ENGINE TO SHUT OFF. WITHIN 30 MINUTES OR MORE VEHICLE WOULD START UP AGAIN. DEALER NOTIFIED, AND INFORMED CONSUMER THAT NOTHING COULD BE FOUND. *AK
LED DISPLAYS ON DASHBOARD NOT LEGIBLE WHEN DRIVING IN THE SUN, ESPECIALLY THESPEEDOMETER DISPLAY.  *AK
THE VEHICLE WAS IN THE PARKING LOT IN PARK, TURNED THE KEY TO START SHIFTING INTO DRIVE, AND IT JUST REVVED UP.   VEHICLE WAS OUT OF CONTROL, UNABLE TO STOP ON TIME.  CONTACTED DEALER.  *AK

components: STEERING,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: WHEN DRIVING IN LOW SPEED AND  MAKING A SLOW TURN VEHICLE WILL STALL. DEALER CAN'T DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM.  ALSO, REPLACED THROTTLE BODY AND POWER STEERING PRESSURE SPRING. *AK
THE DESIGN OF THE HORN MAKES IT HARD TO USE THE HORN NORMALLY, DUE TO SMALL BUTTONS THAT ARE NOT EASILY LOCATED WHEN NECESSARY.  YH
THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS MALFUNCTIONED,  CAUSING POOR VISIBILITY. THE WINDOW GOES UP AND GETS STUCK. THE TRUCK LID IS FAILING.  CLAIMS THAT CALLED WRONG AGENCY. WANTED TO CONTACT THE MANUFACTURER. *AK
ALL  POWER ACCESSORIES, SUCH AS POWER LOCKS/ WINDOWS, AND TRUNK RELEASE  STOPPED WORKING .  ALSO FRONT POWER BRAKE ND CALIPERS  LOCKED UP WHILE DRIVING. THE DEALER HAS NOT BEEN CONTACTED.  *AK
THE INSTRUMENT PANEL UNIT HAS TO BE REPLACED DUE TO POOR VISIBILITY.  ALSO, THE ODOMETER  MILEAGE IN INCORRECT.  *AK

THE PAINT ON THIS CAR IS DISAPPEARING VERY RAPIDLY.  WE OWNED 2 1990 TOWN CARS AND HAD TRADED ONE OVER A YEAR AGAO BECAUSE THE PAINT WAS STARTING TO DISAPPEAR.  LARGE BLOTS OF WHITE ARE APPEARING ALL OVER THE CAR.  THE CARS WERE DIFFERENT COLORS AND BOTH DID THE SAME THING.  ONLY THIS ONE IS REALLY BAD NOW.  IT LOOKS POLKA DOTTED.  SINCE THIS HAPPENED TO BOTH CARS OF THE SAME YEAR I CAN'T HELP BUT THINK THIS IS A PAINT DEFECT.  SO I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF THERE IS A RECALL FOR THE PAINT OR HELP AVAILABLE TO HAVE THE CAR REPAINTED.  I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT LINCOLN WOULD WANT THEIR VECHILES TO GO DOWN THE ROAD LOOKING LIKE IT HAD BEEN BOMBED BY 5000 BIRDS FLYING OVER.  PLEASE LET ME KNOW WHO I CAN CONTACT TO GET SOME HELP.  THANK YOU.  *AK
COMPUTERIZED DASH L.E.D.S. ARE NOT BRIGHT ENOUGH DURING DAYLIGHT, CONSUMER IS NOT ABLE TO READ GAUGES PROPERLY.
VEHICLE WAS PARKED IN  FRONT YARD AND  ELECTRICAL WIRING FROM THE ALTERNATOR MELTED,   CAUSING  A FIRE.  CONSUMER VEHICLE HAD  ALTERNATOR   REPLACED THREE TIMES.*AK
VEHICLE WAS PARKED IN  GARAGE AND CAUGHT ON FIRE ON  PASSENGER'S SIDE IN THE ENGINE, AND BURNT DOWN THE GARAGE.  CANNOT DETERMINE THE PROBLEM.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION AND VIN#.  *AK
THE CAR WAS PARKED WHEN A FIRE STARTED UNDER THE HOOD, CAUSING EXTENSIVE DAMAGE. FIRE DEPT WAS CALLED. THERE WAS NO INSURANCE TO COVER THE FIRE SO OWNER HAD TO PAY ABOUT $5,000 FOR REPAIRS.  *AK
ELECTRICAL SHORTAGE  IN THE ENGINE, RESULTED IN A VEHICLE FIRE. THE MANUFACTURER  HAS BEEN NOTIFIED.  *AK
WHEN DRIVING AND THE SUN IS SHINING CONSUMER CAN'T DETERMINE HOW FAST HE IS TRAVELING DUE TO THE  BLINDING OF  EVERYTHING ON THE DASHBBOARD.  *AK
DIGITAL INST.CLUSTER UNREADABLE ON BRIGHT SUNNY DAYS

WHILE VEHICLE WAS AT A  STOP, AND CONSUMER TRIED TO SWITCH TRANSMISSION PAWL,  VEHICLE  SUDDENLY ACCELERATED.CONSUMER HAD TO STEP ON BRAKE PEDAL, PUT VEHICLE IN NEUTRAL, AND TURN OFF ENGINE SO THA TVEHICLE ENGINE COULD GO BACK TO NORMAL AFTER HAVING STRUCK  A BLOCK WALL.  *AK

WHILE DRIVING AT 40 MPH, THE CAR STARTED ACCELERATING.  CRUISE CONTROL WAS NOT ENGAGED, BUT WAS TURNED OFF TO SLOW DOWN.  BRAKES WERE USED TO CONTROL SPEED UNTIL I REACHED A PARKING LOT WHERE I EXMAINED THE ENGINE.  PROBLEM SEEMED TO BE CONNECTED TO THROTTLE LINKAGE. "JIGGLING" THE THROTTLE SLOWED THE ENGINE RPMS TO IDLE.  PROBLEM OCCURRED FIVE MORE TIMES BEFORE I COULD GET THE CAR TO MY MECHANIC.  HE CLEANED THE LINKAGE, REMOVED THE INTAKE AND DUCT, AND CLEANED THE VALVE AND TB PASSAGES. HE ALSO RECONNECTED A BROKEN (DOWN-SHIFT) CABLE CONNECTOR.  PROBLEM HAS NOT RECURRED.
TV GROMMET FAILED THAT CONNECTS THE THROTTLE BODY LINKAGE, CAUSING THE THROTTLE CABLE AND ACCELERATOR PEDAL TO STICK, RESULTING IN SUDDEN UNCONTROLLED ACCELERATION AND DAMAGE TO TRANSMISSION.
TV GROMMET FAILED CAUSING THE THROTTLE CABLE AND ACELERATOR PEDAL TO BECOME STUCK IN OPENED POSITION RESULTING IN UNWANTED ACCELERATION AND LOSS OF CONTROL.

VEHICLE ISN'T ACCELERATING PROPERLY WHEN  CONSUMER IS DRIVING. CONSUMER HAD TO PULL OFF THE ROAD AS ANOTHER VEHICLE WAS COMING STRAIGHT AT THE CONSUMER VEHICLE. IN ORDER  TO AVOID AN ACCIDENT VEHICLE RAN OVER SOMETHING, AND THE AIR BAGS ON BOTH SIDES DIDN'T DEPLOY.  *AK
VEHICLE FIRE UNDERHOOD, POSSIBLE ENGINE FAILURE.

AFTER ONE HOUR AND 10 MINUTES VEHICLE CAUGHT ON FIRE INSIDE CONSUMER'S GARAGE WHICH SET THE HOUSE ON FIRE AND RESULTED IN  TOTAL PROPERTY DAMAGE.  LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENT INFORMED CONSUMER  THAT THE FIRE ORIGINATED  UNDER THE HOOD, CAUSE UNKNOWN AT THIS THE TIME.  *AK
WE HAVE HAD NO SUCCESS IN SEEKING REIMBURSEMENT FROM DEALER OR MANUFACTURER DESPITE HAVING A VALID EXTENDED SERVICE PLAN COVERING THIS
ONGOING PROBLEM WITH  HOOD UNLATCHING; PERTAINING TO NHTSA RECALL # 95V 091-000. DEALER NOTIFIED MANUFACTURER,  AND WAS INFORMED THAT THEY DO NOT RECOGNIZE PROBLEM.  *AK
ALTERNATOR FAILURE CAUSED ELECTRICAL FIRE IN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT.

VEHICLE WAS PARKED IN CARPORT AND SUDDENLY CAUGHT FIRE, THE VEHICLE WAS TOTALED, AND THE CONSUMER LOST HER  HOME. THE FIRE DEPARTMENT APPEARED AND THE CAUSE OF THE FIRE IS STILL UNDETERMINED,.THE DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND STATE THEY ARE AWARE OF THE 1987-1988 MODELS WITH THIS PROBLEM, BUT ARE NOT AWARE OF THE 1990 MODEL HAVING  ANY DEFECTS. THE PROBLEM CANNOT BE DUPLICATED.  *AK

FRONT BRAKE ROTORS AND PADS  WERE WARPED FOR UNKNOWN REASON. DEALER NOTIFIED AND INFORMED CONSUMER THAT THIS IS VERY COMMON FOR THIS VEHICLE, AND BOTH ROTORS AND PADS  NEED TO BE REPLACED.  *AK  WINDSHIELD WIPERS MALFUNCTIONED.  *YH
ELECTRICAL WIRING HARNESS UNDER HOOD FAILED RESULTING IN VEHICLE FIRE.

WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE  AND A MINUTE AFTER PARKING  CONSUMER NOTICED SMOKE FROM UNDER THE HOOD.  THERE WERE APPROXIMATELY 5 TO 8 INCH FLAMES BURNING EVERYTHING IN SIGHT.  DEALER OR MANUFACTURER  HAVE NOT BEEN NOTIFIED.
HOOD LATCH PLATE FAILED.
WHILE DRIVING DOWN HIGHWAY SOMEONE  CALLED OUT THAT FRONT WHEEL WAS SMOKING.  GOT OUT AND LOOKED AT WHEEL AND THERE WAS A FLAME.  THE WHEEL WAS BURNING.  *AK

WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED WITH THE IGNITION OFF, IT STARTED SMOKING AND CAUGHT ON FIRE UNDER THE HOOD ON THE LEFT SIDE FOR NO APPARENT REASON. THE FIRE WAS PUT OUT BY THE FIRE DEPARTMENT. CAUSE OF THE FIRE IS NOT KNOWN. THE VEHICLE WAS TOTALLED.  *AK
ABOUT 3 MINUTES AFTER PARKING VEHICLE CAUGHT ON FIRE IN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT. THE VEHICLE IS BEING REPAIRED BY THE DEALER.*AK
BRACKET FOR REAR SWAY BAR BROKE DUE TO WEAK MATERIAL.

components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: WHEN DRIVING AND PRESSING ON BRAKES THEY FELT LIKE THEY WERE LOCKING UP/GOT HARD AND TIGHT. THE VEHICLE WOULD NOT ACCELLERATE. THE FRONT PASSENGER'S WHEEL CAUGHT ON FIRE WHILE DRIVING, THE INCIDENT OCCURRED TWO TIMES, DEALER STATED THE PROBLEM COULD BE REMEDIED BY REPLACING THE VALVE BLOCK/PUMP AND GASKET. ALSO,  FLUSHING THE SYSTEM.  REPAIRS RESULT IN COSTS UP TO $2,000.  *AK
CONTINUOUS PROBLEMS WITH OVERHEATING, WHEN THIS HAPPENS ALL BRAKES AND POWER STEERING FAILS.  FAILURES RESULTED IN TWO ACCIDENTS.

WHENEVER DRIVER USES THE SHOULDER BELT, IT WOULD FAIL TO LATCH PROPERLY. NEED TO PLAY WITH IT A WHILE BEFORE IT CLICKS/CATCHES. SOMETIMES IT DOES NOT STAY LATCHED AFTER THAT. TOOK TO DEALER & SERVICE MANAGER SAID IT WAS A PROBLEM, BUT NOT A RECALL & DID NOT KNOW IF ABLE TO REPAIR.  *AK
ANTI LOCK BRAKES FAILED RESULTING IN VEHICLE COLLISION.
THROTTLE VALVE CABLE INSOLATOR FAILED CAUSING VEHICLE'S TRANSMISSION TO SLIP.
WHILE PARKED AN ELECTRICAL SHORT IN THE IGNITION SWITCH CAUSED VEHICLE TO CATCH ON FIRE IN THE ENGINE.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY DETAILS.  *AK
AIR SUSPENSION ON BOTH SIDES OF THE VEHICLE HAVE FAILED SEVERAL TIMES IN THE REAR AND CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO BOTTOM-OUT. THE CAUSE IS THE HOSE RUBBING AND CAUSING A HOLE WHICH ALLOWS AIR TO ESCAPE.
WHILE VEHICLE WAS PARKED FIRE STARTED IN ENGINE COMPARTMENT.CAUSE OF FIRE UNKNOWN.   *AK
THE DRIVER'S SIDE SAFETY BELTRECESSED UNDER THE SEAT, CREATING SN INOPERATIVE SEAT BELT.  ALSO, THE HOOD LATCH DOESN'T FUNCTION PROPERLY AND CREATES A PROBLEM OPENING THE HOOD.  *AK
THE DESIGN OF THE BRAKING SYSTEM MALFUNCTIONED  EVERY YEAR.  HAVING TO REPLACE THE BRAKING SYSTEM 7 TIMES.   DEALER CANNOT DETERMINE PROBLEM. *AK

WHILE DRIVING VEHICLE ABOUT 35 MPH, THE RIGHT FRONT TIRE UPPER CONTROL BRACKET, REAR MOUNT, HAD FRACTURED & LOOSENED OUT OF FRAME.  (ACCORDING TO CONSUMER), NOVEMBER 1995 VEHICLE. AFFECTED 1993. 1994 MODELS WERE RECALLED BY MANUFACTURER.   *AK
